snippet: Attacking midfielder Dimitri Payet's return to the first team will give West Ham United a major boost, manager Slaven Bilic has said ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash with Watford....

headline.main: Bilic Hopes Payet's First Team Return Can Influence West Ham
headline.print_headline: Bilic Hopes Payet's First Team Return Can Influence West Ham

lead_paragraph: Attacking midfielder Dimitri Payet's return to the first team will give West Ham United a major boost, manager Slaven Bilic has said ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash with Watford.

snippet: Leicester City winger Riyad Mahrez has ended speculation over his future by signing a new contract that will keep him at the club until June 2020, the Premier League champions announced on Wednesday....

headline.main: Mahrez Signs New Contract With Leicester
headline.print_headline: Mahrez Signs New Contract With Leicester

lead_paragraph: Leicester City winger Riyad Mahrez has ended speculation over his future by signing a new contract that will keep him at the club until June 2020, the Premier League champions announced on Wednesday.

snippet: Southampton striker Graziano Pelle has joined China's Shandong Luneng for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League club said on Monday....

headline.main: Pelle Moves to Chinese Side Shandong From Southampton
headline.print_headline: Pelle Moves to Chinese Side Shandong From Southampton

lead_paragraph: Southampton striker Graziano Pelle has joined China's Shandong Luneng for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has said the upcoming Premier League fixtures will be his "test" and has admitted the club face a nail-biting struggle to climb away from the relegation zone....

headline.main: West Ham Boss Bilic Admits He Faces Key Test
headline.print_headline: West Ham Boss Bilic Admits He Faces Key Test

snippet: Cash-strapped Chinese technology conglomerate LeEco is in talks on securing a 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) deal with an unnamed strategic investor, its listed unit said....

snippet: Potential purchasers of Hull City will have to dig considerably deeper into their pockets after the club secured their Premier League return by winning what was billed as the most lucrative game in world soccer....

headline.print_headline: Promoted Hull City Subject to Takeover Talk

snippet: Gazovik Orenburg, who have won promotion to the Russian Premier League for the first time, may not have any stars in their line-up but they have been inspired by Leicester City's fairytale English Premier League triumph, their manager said on Tues...

headline.main: Russia's Gazovik Orenburg Eye Leicester-Style Success After Promotion
headline.print_headline: Russia's Gazovik Orenburg Eye Leicester-Style Success After Promotion

lead_paragraph: Gazovik Orenburg, who have won promotion to the Russian Premier League for the first time, may not have any stars in their line-up but they have been inspired by Leicester City's fairytale English Premier League triumph, their manager said on Tuesday.

snippet: If Leicester City win the Premier League title it would be the greatest sporting achievement of the modern era, former striker Tony Cottee has told Reuters....

snippet: Stoke stayed in the hunt for a Europa League spot with victory against a lacklustre Watford in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Stoke Beat Watford to Stay in Hunt for Europe

lead_paragraph: Stoke stayed in the hunt for a Europa League spot with victory against a lacklustre Watford in the Premier League on Saturday.
